item.title: Kajol, Twinkle Khanna to Host Prime Video and Banijay Asia’s New Talk Show (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Production has commenced on Prime Video India’s “Two Much with Kajol and Twinkle,” an original unscripted talk show that pairs Bollywood star Kajol with bestselling author and column
